name: Color Rush (Sander De Keukelaere)
description:
Change as many colored blocks into your own color!

Keep up the pace! The other player is trying to do the same thing!

Keep moving! You can't click the same area twice in a row!

Don't forget, you can't click on blocks with the same color as you!

This is the remade version of a game me and another student made for a small gamejam at school!

You can check out the previous version here: https://atlantiaking.itch.io/color-rush-previous-version

Coding by : Sander De Keukelaere

Art by : Glenn Dumoulin and Sander De Keukelaere

Music by : Sander De Keukelaere

Software used: Visual Studio 2019 (C++)
